overview:
Matt Voigt is a 3x entrepreneur with 15 years of diverse experience in sectors that include technology, healthcare, real estate and finance.

Matt currently serves as the full-time CEO of saambaa, an activity and events platform for mobile, which makes it easy to meet with friends and discover new experiences.

Prior to founding saambaa, Matt founded Voigt Development, a Chicago real estate company which developed $13 million of property over a five year period. Prior to that, Matt co-founded VitalStaff, a medical staffing company that focused on temporary staffing services to the home-heath sector. Mattâ€™s professional experience also includes a background in finance and business development.

Matt has filed two patents (his first @ 17) and graduated from Loyola University Chicago (academic scholarship/Cum Laude) with a B.S. in Finance and minor in Philosophy. Matt enjoys hiking, mountaineering, cooking, running (because he likes cooking), exploring other cultures, and being around anything with a motor, wheels or wings.

www.saambaa.com www.voigtdevelopment.com www.vitalstaffing.com

Specialties include setting a vision, strategy and planning, team building, execution, general management, financial modeling, philosophical rumination, lazy river connoisseuring (not a word).
